install.packages("rvest")
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("progress")

```{r}
library("rvest")
library("tidyverse")
library("progress")

link <-"https://voxukraine.org/uk/category/temi/ekonomika/"

economicnews <- read_html(link)

titles <- economicnews %>%
  html_nodes('.entry-title') %>%
  html_text()
print(titles)

urls <- economicnews %>%
  html_nodes('.entry-title > a') %>%
  html_attr('href')
print(urls)

authors <- economicnews %>%
  html_nodes('.author-bold') %>%
  html_text() %>% 
  gsub("\n", "", .)
print(authors)

dates <- economicnews %>%
   html_nodes('.data-simple-article') %>%
   html_text() %>%
  gsub(" ","", .)
 print(dates)

image <- economicnews %>%
  html_nodes('.thumbnail > a > img') %>%
  html_attr('src')
print(image)

titles <- c()
urls <- c()
authors <- c()
dates <- c()
image <- c()

npages <- 33
link <- "https://voxukraine.org/uk/category/temi/ekonomika/page/"

pb <- progress_bar$new(
format = "  downloading [:bar] :percent in :elapsed ",
total = npages, clear = FALSE, width= 60)

for(page in 1:npages) {
  print(str_c("Scrapping page", page))
  
  current_link <- str_c(link, page)
  
  current_titles <- economicnews %>%
    html_nodes('.entry-title') %>%
    html_text()
  
  current_urls <- economicnews %>%
    html_nodes('.entry-title > a') %>%
    html_attr('href')
  
  current_authors <- economicnews %>%
    html_nodes('.author-bold') %>%
    html_text() %>% 
    gsub("\n", "", .)
  
  current_dates <- economicnews %>%
    html_nodes('.data-simple-article') %>%
    html_text() %>%
    gsub(" ","", .)
  
  current_image <- economicnews %>%
    html_nodes('.thumbnail > a > img') %>%
    html_attr('src')
  
  print(current_titles)
  
  titles <- c(titles, current_titles)
  urls <- c(urls, current_urls)
  authors <- c(authors, current_authors)
  dates <- c(dates, current_dates)
  image <- c(image, current_image)

  Sys.sleep(3)
  pb$tick(1)

}

file_name <- "vox_ukraine_economic.csv"
 
data.frame(title = titles,
           link = urls,
           author = authors,
           date = dates,
           picture = image) %>%
           write.csv(file_name, row.names = FALSE)

df <- read.csv(file_name)
print(df)
```
